titles.title: To eliminate the requirement that, to be eligible for foster care maintenance payments, a child would have been eligible for aid under the former program of Aid to Families with Dependent Children at the time of removal from the home.
Look-back Elimination Act of 2019
Look-back Elimination Act of 2019
Look-back Elimination Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
